document.title: Structural and dynamical studies of superacids and superacidic solutions using neutron and high energy X-ray scattering
document.abstract: The diffusive motions of the Br√∏nsted superacid, hydrogen fluoride, have been studied using quasielastic neutron scattering. Neutron and high energy X-ray diffraction measurements on the Lewis superacid, antimony pentafluoride, are presented along with the results of three applied data models. Finally, structural information was obtained for a 9:1 FSO3H:NH3 solution using neutron diffraction with isotopic substitution and nuclear magnetic resonance.

field.name: advisor2
field.value: Richard M. Pagni, Jamie L. Adcock
